Name: Sydney Church of England Co-Educational Grammar School (SCECGS), Redlands

About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment. Reference assistance available by mail and by telephone. Copying services for books, journals, original records to A3, photographs, maps and plans.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit essential. Access to records not normally available for research can be gained with permission from the Executive Headmaster and Council.

About.Acquisition focus: SCECGS Archives is primarily composed of past student and staff records. Council minutes in microfiche are held. The activities of the School are reflected in the administrative records, magazines and photographs held. (90% in-house).

About.Major holdings: Student Body: Magazines 1910-1991. School Council: Council minutes c1960-1980. School Administration: Student records 1945-1991; Staff records c1960-1990; Photographs 1910-1991; Map and plans 1920-1991; Administrative records 1945-1991.
